016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks;
017
018import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
019
020import javax.faces.component.UIComponent;
021import javax.faces.context.FacesContext;
022import javax.faces.convert.Converter;
023import javax.faces.convert.FacesConverter;
024
025/**
026 * For testing converter
027 *
028 * @author Matthias Walliczek
029 */
030@FacesConverter(ReverseConverter.CONVERTER_ID)
031public class ReverseConverter implements Converter<String> {
032
033    /**
034     * <p>
035     * The standard converter id for this converter.
036     * </p>
037     */
038    public static final String CONVERTER_ID = "de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.ReserveConverter";
039
040    @Override
041    public String getAsObject(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component, final String value) {
042        return reverse(context, component, value);
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public String getAsString(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component, final String value) {
047        return reverse(context, component, value);
048    }
049
050    private String reverse(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component, final String value) {
051        requireNonNull(component);
052        requireNonNull(context);
053        if (null == value) {
054            return "";
055        }
056        return new StringBuilder(value).reverse().toString();
057    }
058
059}
